1531400.name: Airport Simulator 3: Day & Night - Digital Deluxe Content
1531400.description:
The Airport Simulator 3: Day & Night Digital Deluxe Edition includes various digital goodies and exclusive content, such as the comprehensive "Getting Started Guide", wallpapers, a map and helpful Getting Started videos.

Digital map
Your airport at a glance! The digital map gives you a detailed overview of the airport, its buildings and the most important areas.

4K wallpapers
A large variety of exclusive backgrounds bring the atmosphere of a large airport to your home! Get in the mood for planning your next big trip from the comfort of your living room!

Getting Started Guide
Explanations, help and useful tips & tricks - the “Getting Started Guide" answers many questions, gives you an overview of the possibilities that Airport Simulator 3: Day & Night has to offer and makes it easier for you to get started.

Getting Started videos
Find the solution to your problem or the answer to your question in video format! Many important topics, infos and tips & tricks are available here exclusively.

Access to digital goodies
All digital goodies can be found in the game's Steam installation directory in the folder "Digital Deluxe Content" (Steam\SteamApps\common\Airport Simulator 3 - Day & Night) after fully downloading the "Digital Deluxe Content" DLC pack.
